constituent: boy, soil, dirt, ground, compass, direction
heisigStory: The character for a boy shows us a Boy Scout cleaning the dirt out of his compass - the more dirt, the better.
koohiiStory1: Little boys always head in the direction of mud and dirt.
koohiiStory2: Boys thoughts often head in dirty directions.
myStory: con trai. nhà sư. tu hành gia. hướng vào đất để niệm phật đi tu.
readingExamples: 坊主 (ぼうず), 朝寝坊 (あさねぼう), 赤ん坊 (あかんぼう)
